sentences.en: Abstract art is a product of the untalented, sold by the unprincipled to the utterly bewildered.
sentences.cn: 抽象艺术是无能的人的作品, 然后被无良的人卖给无知的人.

sentences.en: An unprincipled, deceitful, and unreliable person a scoundrel or rascal.
sentences.cn: 无赖, 流氓,恶棍:不讲道德 、 欺诈和不可靠的人;赖皮或流氓.

sentences.en: Closely observes closely Geng Haoshi in them, the unprincipled person actually sneaks off from their eyelid.
sentences.cn: 在他们紧紧盯住耿浩时,坏人却从他们眼皮底下溜走.

sentences.en: Comprehensive, too, can mean unprincipled inclusiveness, the inclusiveness of the syllabus or the anthology.
sentences.cn: 理解力也可能意味着无原则的包容, 教学大纲和文集式的包容.

sentences.en: He is totally unprincipled in money matters; you can't trust him.
sentences.cn: 他在金钱方面根本不讲道德, 你不能相信他.

sentences.en: He is unprincipled, swindling the widow and her fatherless son.
sentences.cn: 他这个人很卑鄙,期负人家孤儿寡母.

sentences.en: He never gets involved in unprincipled disputes.
sentences.cn: 他从不介入无原则的争端.

sentences.en: It is a market where people can be very unprincipled and unpleasant.
sentences.cn: 在这个市场里，一些人可能根本不讲道德原则，非常令人厌恶。

sentences.en: The rejection of absolutism implicit in our constitutional structure may sometimes make our politics seem unprincipled.
sentences.cn: 宪法结构中固有的对专制主义的抑制,在有些时候可能使我们的政治显得缺乏原则.

sentences.en: They cling to the unprincipled safe middle of every issue.
sentences.cn: 他们对任何事情都严守不讲道德以求保险的折中立场.

sentences.en: This hero is upholds justly, subdues the unprincipled person is his only objective.
sentences.cn: 这位英雄是主持正义的, 制伏坏人是他的惟一宗旨.

sentences.en: Unprincipled accommodation will do harm to him.
sentences.cn: 无原则的迁就对他有害.

sentences.en: When we speak of unity, we do not mean unprincipled peace.
sentences.cn: 所谓团结, 并非一团和气.

trans.tran_cn: 不道德的，肆无忌惮的，不诚实的，无原则的
trans.tran_en: not caring whether what you do is morally right
